item.title: Trump ally Ramaswamy to make major announcement about his political future
item.description: Vivek Ramaswamy, an ally of President Donald Trump, will launch his 2026 Republican campaign for Ohio governor in one week, sources confirm to Fox New...

item.title: Swalwell declares 'all crashes are Trump's fault' as he doubles down on plane disaster blame game
item.description: Rep. Eric Swalwell, D-Calif., declared that President Donald Trump has had more plane crashes in his first month in office than any U.S. president.

item.title: NYC Mayor Adams refuses to resign in sermon: 'I have a mission to finish'
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams told churchgoers in a sermon that he won't resign amid legal troubles as he looks to finish the mission that God put hi...

item.title: Putin sending foreign minister to Saudi Arabia for talks with Trump officials
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio will meet with his Russian counterpart in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday to discuss a possible peace deal for Ukraine.
